description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Racing and 'Chasing: a collection of sporting stories ... With illustrations by C. E. Brock, H. M. Brock, etc" Author: WATSON, Alfred Edward Thomas. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 012623.ee.2." Page: 137 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1897 Publisher: Longmans & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003863277 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
